## How Does Minecraft Version Affect Success Rate

Aggregated data by conducting a carefully designed experiment. Applied statistical functions in R to visualize findings

```r
## CONFIDENCE INTERVAL
## Z CI
zCritVal<-qnorm(0.975)
y_bar+c(-1,1)*zCritVal*standErr

## NEW T CI
tCritVal<-qt(0.975, df=n-1)
y_bar+c(-1,1)*tCritVal*standErr
```
